name: Basic Enhanced Canned Stock
keywords: carrot, chicken broth, onion, side dish
recipeIngredient: Several sprigs fresh parsley, if you have them
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients except salt and ground pepper in a medium saucepan, and bring just about to a boil. Turn heat a little lower, and simmer, uncovered, for 10 to 20 minutes. Strain, taste and adjust seasonings.
